meanings.sent1: The duskiest corner of the room was hard to see in.
meanings.sent2: The forest became duskiest as the sun set.
meanings.sent3: The duskiest paint color made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her duskiest dress matched the evening sky.
meanings.sent5: The duskiest clouds loomed ominously overhead.

meanings.sent1: The duskiest room in the house was perfect for napping.
meanings.sent2: The duskiest alleyway felt eerie at night.
meanings.sent3: His duskiest humor always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The duskiest candle barely illuminated the room.
meanings.sent5: The duskiest path was hard to navigate in the dark.

meanings.definition: Reaching the point of twilight or dusk.
meanings.sent1: The duskiest time of day is when the stars start to appear.
meanings.sent2: The duskiest hour signaled the end of their journey.
meanings.sent3: The duskiest sky painted a beautiful backdrop for the city.
meanings.sent4: The duskiest moment felt like a dream slipping away.
meanings.sent5: The duskiest evening brought a sense of calm over the town.
